import React from 'react'; import { FaUserShield, FaCogs, FaBoxOpen, FaUsers } from 'react-icons/fa'; // Các icon từ react-icons import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; // Sử dụng các thành phần của react-bootstrap const HomePage = () => { return ( {/* Tiêu đề chính */}

Welcome to Ecommerce Admin

{/* Mô tả ngắn gọn về trang */}

This is the admin dashboard where you can manage various aspects of your ecommerce platform. To access and perform administrative tasks such as managing products, categories, and customers, you must have the appropriate user role (Admin User). If you do not have access, please contact your system administrator.

{/* Các thẻ quản lý */} {/* Card for View Customers */} Manage Customers View and manage customer accounts, profiles, and details. {/* Card for Manage Categories */} Manage Categories Organize products into categories and manage them effectively. {/* Card for Manage Products */} Manage Products Add, update, and manage your product inventory and details. {/* Lời nhắc về menu điều hướng */}

Use the navigation menu to get started with managing your ecommerce platform.

); }; export default HomePage;
